testsuite.name: MusicAdvisorTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #8
There are no playlists in correct format on "playlists {name}" action. Make sure you correctly parsed the category name.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -access http://127.0.0.1:45678 -resource http://127.0.0.1:56789
> auth
use this link to request the access code: http://127.0.0.1:45678/authorize?client_id=55baa53664b8400995154bb8f972fa92&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8080&response_type=code waiting for code... Try again. code received Tester: done request 3: Got the code. Return back to your program.
making http request for access_token... response:
---SUCCESS---> playlists Party Time Specified id doesn't exist
